item.title: How to check the subscription Level C#
item.dc:creator: ShadowMonster
item.description:
static bool check_sub(string subname)
{
   foreach (var sub in KeyAuthApp.user_data.subscriptions)
   {
      if (sub.subscription == subname)
      return true;
   }
   return false;
}

call if like so

if (check_sub("wadawdawd"))
{
   Console.WriteLine("\n user has sub wadawdawd");
}

item.title: How to check the subscription Level C#
item.dc:creator: inivation
item.description:
hello can some1 help me ??

i want to add a subscription check to my login button so that im only able to log in if my license
level is 2.
i cant find anything to this on the documentaion please help me.

My code
Login.KeyAuthApp.check();
{
if (subscription == “2”)
{
MainForm main = new MainForm();
main.Show();
this.Hide();
}
else
{
MessageBox.Show(“Wrong License level try to upgrade”);
}
}
